Name: Street Striker
About the game: Street Striker is an arcade game about street fighting. Complete the training, choose a hero and an arena, smash crates and barrels to find weapons, or use your melee skills to stand up against waves of bandits and complete the level. Gameplay Features Spectacular animations and effects Simple and intuitive combat system Five visually diverse arenas Nice sound design
